title: Refactor core epic management code
description: Refactor epic-related code in task-manager core module. Improve epic persistence layer, validation logic, and relationship management. Extract epic operations into dedicated service classes and improve error handling.

comments.text: CORE REFACTORING AREAS: 1) Extract epic operations from TaskManager into EpicManager service class, 2) Improve epic validation logic separation, 3) Refactor epic-task relationship management, 4) Enhance epic status transition logic, 5) Improve epic persistence layer abstraction, 6) Add better error handling for epic operations
